Posts.Content: Can anyone tell me more about this? My mom is diagnosed with this type of cancer. And her surgery is done just a few days ago.She tells she don't feel hunger and is losing appetite. Can you tell me what precautions to take after treatment for this type of cancer? And what kinda food to take if food influences it then? I will be grateful for  your help. Thank you very much
Posts.Title: Spindle Cell Sarcoma of breast
